translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おおおお、折れるー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oooooh, it's breaking!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……まったく……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hah... geez...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あだだだ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ouch ouch ouch...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相変わらず日光さんは怒らせると怖いな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're still scary when you're angry, Hikari-san...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ようやるわ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You really went all out...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂だってそこまではせんかったぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even I didn't go that far.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴方とよく似てますよ、彼は」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's very much like you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやいや、ちゃうって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, no, that's not it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんな駄剣と一緒にすんなー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't lump me together with such a lousy sword!
Hah...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはまだ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was still...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹達がランスと出会う少し前――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A little before Miki and the others met Rance—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街を追い出された――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were driven out of the town—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 原因は健太郎の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The cause was Kentaro's

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無敵結界を見られたのが原因である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: invincible barrier being seen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただの人間ではないことが町民達にバレ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The townspeople found out he was not an ordinary human,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 討伐隊が発足されてしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and a hunting party was formed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうなれば、もう街にはいられない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In that case, they could no longer stay in the town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 三人はすぐさま、街を出て街道を進む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The three immediately left the town and proceeded along the road.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍出動の要請を出した、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rumors were even circulating that the Leazas army had been called out,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: などという噂まで出回っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: things like that were being said.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今頃、街はちょっとした騒ぎになっている筈である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By now, the town was probably in quite an uproar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、今、当の二人は――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And now, the two themselves—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「福神漬けー♪　らっきょうー♪
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fukujinzuke ♪ Rakkyo ♪

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでもいいけど彩りは忘れずにー♪」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anything's fine, just don't forget the colors ♪

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「トッピングは豚カツにシーフード納豆、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Toppings are pork cutlet and seafood natto,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方のお好みでどうぞー♪」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: choose whatever you like ♪

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カレーの歌を歌っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were singing a curry song.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「次はカレーの美味しいところがいいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Next, I want a place with tasty curry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃあ、ゼスかな？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, maybe Zeths?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとなく暑そうだし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems kind of hot there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ゼスは大丈夫？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is Zeths okay?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また健太郎くん、魔法が使えないからって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Won't Kentaro get caught as a slave again just because he can't use magic?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴隷として捕まっちゃうんじゃ……」
「なんだか最近、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems that recently,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その制度なくなったみたいだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that system was abolished.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へー、じゃー行ってみよーうみよーう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, really? Then, let's go see for ourselves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人にとって、これくらいは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For the two of them, this much was

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくあることの一つに過ぎなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: just one of the many usual things.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 休憩中、日光は姿が見えない美樹を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During break, Hikari went looking for Miki who was out of sight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 探しに出ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was searching for her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （遠くに行って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I hope she hasn't wandered off far and gotten lost...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 迷子になったりしていなければいいけど……）
「あ、美樹ちゃ――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, Miki—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹を見つけ、呼びかけようとした動きが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He found Miki and was about to call out when his movement instantly stopped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 瞬時に止まる。
「……ッ、うく……っ、ぐすっ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Ugh... *sniffle*...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらに背を向けた小さな美樹の肩が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The small shoulders of Miki, who had turned her back to him,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとなく暑そうだし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems kind of hot there.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is Zeths okay?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また健太郎くん、魔法が使えないからって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Won't Kentaro get caught as a slave again just because he can't use magic?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴隷として捕まっちゃうんじゃ……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems that recently,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へー、じゃー行ってみよーうみよーう」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For the two of them, this much was

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくあることの一つに過ぎなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: just one of the many usual things.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During break, Hikari went looking for Miki who was out of sight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 探しに出ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was searching for her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （遠くに行って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I hope she hasn't wandered off far and gotten lost...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 迷子になったりしていなければいいけど……）
「あ、美樹ちゃ――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, Miki—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹を見つけ、呼びかけようとした動きが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He found Miki and was about to call out when his movement instantly stopped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 瞬時に止まる。
「……ッ、うく……っ、ぐすっ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Ugh... *sniffle*...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらに背を向けた小さな美樹の肩が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The small shoulders of Miki, who had turned her back to him,
